quote: “Giving users easy access to many different kinds of digital assets on the blockchain and, particularly, tokens that are linked to assets in the real world, is crucial to seeing blockchain adoption reach the next level”
“The blockchain does one thing: It replaces third-party trust with mathematical proof that something happened.”
“One-hundred percent of the stocks and bonds trading on wall street today, COULD BE TOKENIZED, and in five years, one-hundred percent of the stocks and bonds on wall street WILL be tokenized.“
person: - Robert Greifeld, former chairman and CEO of Nasdaq
